Html:
Hello radioman,

if i want to make a "static Map" Screenshot in a high Zoomlevel like 14 of an area big like the suiss an argument exception  "invalid parameter" is showing.

But sometimes same area with this zoomlevel makes a screenshot, somtimes not. Do you have any idea why?

I've changed using in try catch but there is no change.

 

Greets

RobbeEDE
maybe to low memory in the system, how big are your maps?
This is realy strange. Sometimes i got this error if i am going to make a picture with the size 18000x13000, but sometimes not. Sometimes i got this error even with a picture size 8000x6500.

Seems to be a memory problem.

i used your bigmapmaker and partet the interessting area in 4 parts. Works fine:)

Thanks alot!
